text: Ithi, ngubani iNkosi yamazulu nomhlaba na? Ithi, “uMvelinqangi” ithi, “ngakube nizithathele abanye abavikeli esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi abangaziphatheli nzuzo nakulimaza emiphefumulweni yabo na?” ithi, “ngakube uyefana yini oyimpumputhe kanye nobabonayo noma ngakube buyefana yini ubumnyama nokukhanya na? Noma benzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni, abadale okunjengendalo yakhe ukuze indalo (abayidalile neyakhe) ibukeke ifana kubona ithi, “uMvelinqangi ongumdali wezinto zonke futhi ungoyedwa ongavinjwa”
